name: 3 GamesForPSP
description:
How to Play 3 Games in PSP

PC 1. You need To Download PPSSPP

2. You Need to C:\PSP Games

3. Put 3 Games on PSP Games

4. Launch PPSSPP

5. Search C:\ and PSP Games

6. Have Fun

PSP 1. Plug USB Cable on PSP

2. Install 3 Games on PSP

3. Open Folder GAME In PSP

4. Put 3 Games For PSP (Only Folder)

5. Have Fun (ATTENTION, YOU NEED TO MEMORY CARD)

And that's it!
